
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
options(scipen=999)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("r_values_6446_claims.csv")
```


```{r}
df <- df %>%
  mutate(quad = num_of_studies * num_of_studies)

df_less <- df %>%
  filter(num_of_studies <= 50)

df_less %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=num_of_studies, y = diff)) + geom_point(alpha= 0.1)

mod <- glm(data = df_less, sig_to_insig ~ num_of_studies, family = "binomial")
summary(mod)

sum(df_less$sig_to_insig)/ nrow(df_less)
```
